channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Metasploit Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Metasploit Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-0599|2024-08-02T05:17:50.108Z -- rapid7 -- metasploit%20pro
item.description: Rapid7 Metasploit Pro versions 4.21.2 and lower suffer from a stored cross site scripting vulnerability, due to a lack of JavaScript request string sanitization.Â Using this vulnerability, an authenticated attacker can execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the target browser against another Metasploit Pro user using a specially crafted request. Note that in most deployments, all Metasploit Pro users tend to enjoy privileges equivalent to local administrator.
